# External TODO

External TODO means to do something in another repository that will control this one in some way.

## Frontend command definitions

- [ ] Make a frontend to define the commands
	- [ ] Define the command
		- [ ] The description
		- [ ] Its options
			- [ ] Description of each option
			- [ ] The type of the options
	- [ ] A little code editor to control what the command and options do

## Make a frontend

- [ ] Package deployer frontend

## Models

- [ ] Store deployment state on the database

Implement deployment state abstract class and be able to store it in mysql database.
